project_abstract.cdata: The project would include: (a) construction of a hydroelectric project on the Tungnaa, about 100 miles from Reykjavik, including a 44-m high rockfill dam and a power house with two 50-MW generating units; (b) construction of a 35-km 220-KV transmission line; from Sigalda to Burfell with associated substations; and (c) consulting services for detailed engineering and supervision over construction.
